transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, haan ji.
Customer: Hi, Deepanshi ma'am, very good morning. Sweety baat kar rahi thi. Kal bhi shaam ko baat hui thi na aapki aapke wo dusri company ke liye.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Hai na, IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi, Govind ke manager. Actually, kal aapne I think mail bheja hua hai Govind ko dusri company ka.
Executive: Haan ji. Hai na? Main ek baar confirm karna chah rahi thi. Ek baar aap mujhe batayengi ye jo aapki second wali company hai, iska register number kya hoga?
Customer: Isme matlab kaun sa number register hai?
Executive: Primary number you are asking?
Customer: Primary number hi register hai.
Executive: Aap primary number puch rahi hai na?
Executive: Haan, haan, primary number hi. Jaise jo aapki ek to GD wali GD agency ek aapki company hai, right? Ek dusri company mein bhi aapka same issue hai, right? To main usme aapse puch rahi thi ki usme aapka register number kya hai primary wala jo mention hai.
Customer: Haan, main wohi bata rahi. Jaise GD mein kya hua tha, pehle numbers kuch aur the. Jab employee hamare paas kaam kar raha tha. Hmm. Humne woh numbers band karwa diye jab humne unko nikala. Unke haath se IndiaMART ka woh account tha, to unhone waha pe woh numbers change kar liye. Unhone apne koi numbers lekar waha pe daal diye. Tabhi maine mail kiya tha ki mujhe ye primary number aur ye email ID change karwana hai. Similarly.
Executive: Main samajh gayi lekin main issue aapka mujhe pata hai. But mere ko laga ki shayad aapko register number pata hoga ki haan woh mere employee ka hai. To ek baar main unko unhone change kar liya na to main kyunki humne woh jo numbers unko diye the operate karne ke liye, woh band ho chuke hai. To main aapko woh bata ke bhi kuch nahi kar sakti.
Executive: Koi baat nahi, ek minute line pe rukiyega. Main na aapka company open kar rahi hu. Actually kya hua hai, aapne na ye same dusri company ka bhi jo issue hai na woh same matlab jo hamare paas company hai usi pe aapne open kar diya hai. Thik hai? Aur basically jo hota hai jo company aapki dusri wali hai, aapko us pe ye concern open karna tha. Right? Aap same aapne same company pe dusri wali ke liye bhi aapne concern raise kar diya hai, right? To main aapko wohi check karne ke liye maine aapko call kiya hai ki main ek bari aapko na jo aapka abhi second company ka jo abhi account handle kar raha hai person, ek bari main aapko unka number provide karaungi, unka mail ID aapko dungi aur aap phir aap us us company pe apni complaint ye wali cheeze aap daalna, thik hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ek second. Haan. Kyunki actually kya hota hai, aapki beshak do companiya run kar rahi hai lekin do aapke dono companiyon ka na alag alag account manager hoga. To aapko haan, to alag alag hi concern issue raise karna hoga. Yaha pe aapki company jo dekh rahe hai, Akash dekh rahe hai dusri wali. Thik hai? Shark se International LLP karke aapki company hai na? Aur haan, ye Akash sir aapke dekh rahe hai. Main ek baar Akash ki mail ID aur Akash ka number aapko de rahi hu. Pehle aap try kijiyega Akash ko call kijiyega directly. Thik hai? Direct karke aap apni is company ke liye jo bhi ye problems hai woh aap bataiyega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur baki ek bari main unka mail ID bhi provide kara de rahi hu aapko. Phir us mail ID pe unko ye details jo aapne Govind ko bheja hai na, woh aap unko ek bari forward kar dijiyega. Unke haath se resolve definitely ho jayega aur agar kabhi bhi nahi bhi hota hai, to aap directly Govind ko call kijiyega kyunki ye na concern aapka baar baar yaha pe open ho ja raha hai. To aap directly haan, directly hamare number pe call karke aur aap is cheez se related discuss kar lijiyega phir hum Akash se discuss karke aapka ye resolve kara denge.
Customer: Thik hai, mujhe bhej dijiye Akash ka number.
Executive: Haan, to abhi main Akash ka number aapko de rahi hu, Akash ka mail ID aapko de rahi hu. Aap ek baar baat kijiye aur ye wala concern main wapas se aapka close kar rahi hu. Kal ki tarah wapas se aapko mil jayega to waha pe aap feedback de dijiyega.
Customer: Okay, okay, thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Haan, aur ye aapka same number WhatsApp pe hai na?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Haan, to main ye aapko message drop kar de rahi hu, thik hai? Apne WhatsApp number pe.
Customer: Thik hai, haan, aap Akash ka number aur email ID bhejoge na?
Executive: Dekho, haan, abhi mere paas maine abhi aapko hi bhi daal diya hai.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai, okay.
Executive: Okay, ma'am, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change primary number and email ID.

- Issue with IndiaMART account due to ex-employee.

- Concern opened under the wrong company account.



Resolution:

- Provided contact details of the correct account manager.

- Advised to forward details to the new account manager.

- Closed the current concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact the new account manager.

- Customer will provide feedback on the new concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account, company, email id, primary number, change
